verses.1: Tua ciangin Job in thu genkik a,
verses.2: “Keima dikna a hong seelcipsak Pasian, ka lungsim a hong gimsak Vanglian Pasian a nungta ahih mah bangin,
verses.3: ka sungah nuntakna a om lai teng, Pasianʼ hu, ka nak ah ka diik lai teng,
verses.4: ka muk tawh thusia peuhmah ka gen het kei dinga, ka kam tawh zuau thu peuhmah ka gen het kei ding hi, ci-in ka kiciam hi.
verses.5: Note a thuman hi, kong ci ngei kei dinga, ka nuntak lai teng, kei a thuman hiʼng, ka cihna thu ka khia ngei kei ding hi.
verses.6: Kei thuman ka kisakna ka khia ngei kei ding hi. Ka lungsimah kisuanna om loin siang mahmah hi.
verses.7: “Kei a hong langpan, kei a hong dote in migilo le thuman lote bangin gimna thuak ta uh hen.
verses.8: Pasian in amauteʼ nuntakna a laksak hun ciangin, migilote adingin lametna om nawn ahi hiam?
verses.9: Lungkhamna a thuak uh ciangin Pasian in amauʼ kikona awging ngai ding ahi hiam?
verses.10: Pasianʼ piak ding lungdamna a deih ding uh kilawm ahih manin, ama tungah thu a nget tawntung ding uh a kilawm ahi hi.
verses.11: “Pasianʼ vangliatna bangzahin lian mahmah cih hong gensak unla, Vanglian Pasianʼ geel sa teng hong lak telsak dih un.
verses.12: Ahi zongin tuate khempeuh na theih khit sa uh ahi hi. Tua ahih ciangin bang hangin mawk pau na hi uh hiam?
verses.13: “Vanglian Pasian in migilote, mi ngongtatte, gim a piak zia hih bang ahi hi.
verses.14: Tapa tampi a neih hangun, a vekpi-in gal sungah si mangkhin ding uh hi. A tate uh a tawntungin gilkial niloh ding uh hi.
verses.15: A nungta lai sunte zong pulnatna tawh si ding uh a, meigong numeite in misite kah zo nawn lo ding uh hi.
verses.16: Migilote in kuama sim zawh loh ngun tampi tak nei ding uh a, gen zawh lohin nikten puansilh ciang venvan ding uh hi.
verses.17: Ahi zongin mihoih pawl khat in tua puante silhin, thuman mi pawl khat in tua ngunte tang lel ding uh hi.
verses.18: Migiloteʼ lam innte kho lo a, maimom bu, ahih kei leh lo honna buk tawh kibang lel hi.
verses.19: Amaute a hau sa-in lum uh a, ahih hangin a khanlawh uh ciangin a hauhna teng uh na maimang ta hi.
verses.20: Lauhuaina in tuikhang pak bangin nawk gawp dinga, zan ciangin huihpi in amaute mut khia mang ding hi.
verses.21: Nisuahna huihpi in amaute leen khia-in a inn panun gamlapi ah leen khia ding hi.
verses.22: Amaute a suahtak theih nading a hanciam tantan kimlai mah, hehpih ngaihsut het loin leen khia mang ding hi.
verses.23: Amaute a tai laitakun huih in nawk gawpin, a susia gawp dingin mut khia gawp ding hi.
